Affirmation: I have 'got this'
I will figure it out
I am a smart cookie
I believe in me
Sucking at something is the first step towards being good at something
Struggling is part of learning
Everything has cracks - that is how the light gets in
Mistakes do not make you less capable
We are all works in progress
I are a capable human
I belong here
I know more than I think
If everything was easy I would be bored
I admire myself for taking this on
I am resourceful and clever
I will find a way
I know I will sort it out
Struggling means I am learning
I am doing a great job
I am rooting for me
I love me
I give myself permission to love myself
I give myself permission to love others
My mind is full of brilliant ideas
I make a difference in the world by simply existing in it
I am learning valuable lessons every day
I am worthy and deserving of respect
I know more than I knew yesterday
I am an inspiration
My life is already a miracle of chance waiting for me to shape its destiny
Nothing is impossible. The word itself says 'I’m possible!'
Failure is just another way to learn how to do something right
I give myself permission to do what is right for me
I can do it
It is not a sprint, it is a marathon. One step at a time
Success is the progressive realization of a worthy goal
People with goals succeed because they know where they are going
All I need is the plan, the roadmap, and the courage to press on to my destination
The opposite of courage in our society is not cowardice... it is conformity
Whenever we’re afraid, it’s because we don’t know enough. If we understood enough, we would never be afraid
The past does not equal the future
The path to success is to take massive, determined action
It’s what you practice in private that you will be rewarded for in public
Small progress is still progress
Don't worry if you find flaws in your past creations, it's because you've evolved
Starting is the most difficult step - but you can do it
Enjoy the journey
Mistakes are learning opportunities
